meanings.definition: Have in mind as a purpose.
meanings.sent1: I intend to finish my homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: She always intends to help her friends when they need it.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to intend to catch the elusive mouse.
meanings.sent4: His words were intended to comfort her during a difficult time.
meanings.sent5: The chef carefully intended each ingredient to create a delicious dish.

meanings.sent1: We intend to go on a hike this weekend.
meanings.sent2: Do you intend to visit your grandparents next month?
meanings.sent3: The squirrel intended to gather as many acorns as possible before winter.
meanings.sent4: Her smile intended to brighten up the room.
meanings.sent5: The architect intended to design a building that would stand out in the city skyline.
